programme.title: A European Christmas
programme.desc: When Christmas movie director Ivy has another 'heartless' flop, she seeks the star of her debut hit in snowy Serbia. Despite refusing to return, he shows her the wonder of Serbian Christmas.

programme.title: A Very English Christmas
programme.desc: Christmas in the English countryside isn't in Emma's plans until her sister, Amy, plans her wedding for Christmas eve. Dylan, Amy's Christmas market co-owner, teams up with Emma to bring order to the whirlwind wedding.

programme.title: Christmas in Scotland
programme.desc: On vacation in Scotland, a New York installation designer is tasked with helping a small, rural community compete in a "Best Christmas Village" festival. She is forced to work with a wealthy, heir who sees Christmas as an inconvenience.

programme.title: Saving Christmas Spirit
programme.desc: An archaeologist lets Christmas magic into her heart and finds both history and love.

programme.title: Christmas in the City
programme.desc: To help her daughter during the holidays, a woman (Ashley Williams) tries to bring the Christmas spirit back to her department store.

programme.title: Sue Thomas F.B.Eye
programme.desc: Sue's first assignment involves an anonymous bomb threat at a local oil company; Lucy wants Sue to become her roommate.

programme.title: Sue Thomas F.B.Eye
programme.desc: Sue and her unit are assigned to protect a visiting dignitary targeted for assassination by terrorists.

programme.title: Sue Thomas F.B.Eye
programme.desc: Sue cultivates her first FBI informant after Jack and Bobby bust a guy for selling steroids; an office manager is determined to make Myles' life miserable.

programme.title: Snowy With a Chance of Christmas
programme.desc: A weatherwoman is tasked with saving her local TV station. When she partners with a toy drive run by a single father who only cares to give back and not give in to the holiday spirit, she finds her heart is something she can't predict.

programme.title: Christmas Casanova
programme.desc: A podcaster in need of catchy Christmas content offers to help Daniyal win over his love in exchange for the ability to record the process. As the two work together, it becomes clear that Daniyal might be trying to win over the wrong woman.

programme.title: A Perfect Christmas Pairing
programme.desc: After a bad review from a food critic, renowned chef Grace Cooke returns home for Christmas and reconnects with her roots.

programme.title: A Vineyard Christmas
programme.desc: Heather is determined to create the perfect Christmas episode by featuring a unique winery from her hometown.

programme.title: The Christmas Venue
programme.desc: Losing faith in Christmas after a rough breakup, Cait heads home and meets Drew.

programme.title: A Christmas Village
programme.desc: To save her reputation, Piper agrees to work for the owner of the failing Santa's Village. While working there, she rediscovers the magic of Christmas.

programme.title: Snowy With a Chance of Christmas
programme.desc: A weatherwoman is tasked with saving her local TV station. When she partners with a toy drive run by a single father who only cares to give back and not give in to the holiday spirit, she finds her heart is something she can't predict.

programme.title: Christmas Casanova
programme.desc: A podcaster in need of catchy Christmas content offers to help Daniyal win over his love in exchange for the ability to record the process. As the two work together, it becomes clear that Daniyal might be trying to win over the wrong woman.
